data: Value of x flows from uint x to i++ < x
Value of sum flows from uint sum to sum += i
Value of sum flows from uint sum to return sum
Value of i flows from uint i = 0 to i++
Value of i flows from i++ to i++
Value of i flows from i++ to sum += i
Value of sum flows from sum += i to sum += i
Value of sum flows from sum += i to return sum
